動.definition: (of sth) to move; to set in movement; to displace; to touch; to make use of; to stir (emotions); to alter; abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

動不動.definition: (typically followed by 就[jiu4]) apt to (lose one's temper, catch a cold etc); at the drop of a hat

動不動就生氣.pinyin: dòng bù dòng jiù shēng qì
動不動就生氣.definition: to be quick to take offense; to have a short fuse

動作.definition: movement; motion; action (CL:個|个[ge4]); to act; to move

動保.definition: animal protection (abbr. for 動物保護|动物保护[dong4wu4 bao3hu4])

動口.definition: to use one's mouth (to say sth)

動嘴皮.definition: to move one's lips; to wag one's tongue

動嘴皮兒.definition: erhua variant of 動嘴皮|动嘴皮[dong4 zui3 pi2]

動嘴皮子.definition: see 動嘴皮|动嘴皮[dong4 zui3 pi2]

動因.definition: motivation; moving force; underlying force; agent

動土.definition: to break ground (prior to building sth); to start building

動彈不得.definition: to be unable to move a single step

動心.definition: to be moved; to be tempted

動情.definition: to get excited; passionate; aroused to passion; to fall in love; on heat (of animals)

動情期.definition: estrus; the rutting season; on heat

動感.definition: sense of movement (often in a static work of art); dynamic; vivid; lifelike

動感單車.definition: spin class; indoor cycling class (a type of group fitness class); exercise bike used in such a class; spin bike

動態助詞.definition: aspect particle, such as 著|着[zhe5], 了[le5], 過|过[guo4]

動手.definition: to set about (a task); to hit; to punch; to touch

動手動腳.definition: to come to blows; to paw; to grope; to get fresh

動手腳.definition: (coll.) to tamper with; to mess around with

動手術.definition: (of a surgeon) to operate (on sb); (of a patient) to have an operation

動搖.definition: to sway; to waver; to rock; to rattle; to destabilize; to pose a challenge to

動植物.definition: plants and animals; flora and fauna

動武.definition: to use force; to come to blows

動毫毛.definition: to lay a finger on sb; to harm sb in the slightest way

動漫.definition: cartoons and comics; anime and manga; cartoon (animated movie); anime

動物莊園.definition: Animal Farm (1945), novel and famous satire on communist revolution by George Orwell 喬治·奧威爾|乔治·奥威尔[Qiao2 zhi4 · Ao4 wei1 er3]; also translated 動物農場|动物农场[Dong4 wu4 Nong2 chang3]

動物農場.definition: Animal Farm (1945), novel and famous satire on communist revolution by George Orwell 喬治·奧威爾|乔治·奥威尔[Qiao2 zhi4 · Ao4 wei1 er3]

動用.definition: to utilize; to put sth to use

動盪.definition: variant of 動蕩|动荡[dong4 dang4]

動真格.definition: to get serious about sth; to pull no punches; to be determined to see sth through

動筆.definition: to put pen to paper; to start writing or painting

動粗.definition: to use violence (against sb); to strong-arm sb; to manhandle

動線.definition: path taken by people moving through a space; flowline (in architecture, interior design, urban planning etc)

動能車.definition: car with a new type of propulsion system (hybrid, hydrogen-powered etc)

動脈粥樣硬化.pinyin: dòng mài zhōu yàng yìng huà

動腦筋.definition: to use one's brains; to think

動臥.definition: D-class (high-speed) sleeper train (D stands for Dongche 動車|动车[dong4che1]) (abbr. for 臥鋪動車組列車|卧铺动车组列车[wo4pu4 dong4che1zu3 lie4che1])

動蕩.definition: unrest (social or political); turmoil; upheaval; commotion

動身.definition: to go on a journey; to leave

動車.definition: (PRC) (D- or C-class) high-speed train; power car; multiple-unit train (abbr. for 動車組|动车组[dong4che1zu3])

動輒.definition: easily; readily; frequently; at every turn; at the slightest pretext

動輒得咎.definition: faulted at every turn (idiom); can't get anything right

動量詞.definition: verbal classifier (in Chinese grammar); measure word applying mainly to verbs

動靜.definition: (detectable) movement; (sign of) activity; movement and stillness

動魄驚心.definition: see 驚心動魄|惊心动魄[jing1 xin1 dong4 po4]
